full_description:
This is not an all inclusive job description but an overview of the duties and responsibilities. UFlex is open to relatively new college graduates.
\n
Duties and Responsibilities
\n
\n
Collect and analyze data for for potential business and/or organizational opportunities
\n
Coordinate with different project and departmental teams to improve productivity and efficiency
\n
Analyze business processes and provide continuous improvement recommendations
\n
Collaborate and communicate with departments within the organization and other stakeholders in optimizing goals, objectives & requirements.
\n
Strong communication skills and ability to effectively present through process mapping, research, analytics, modeling and integration of technology to management, stakeholders and IT.
\n
Create Reports and visually present implementation of continuous improvement opportunities.
\n
Other duties and responsibilities as assigned.
\n
\n
Requirements:
\n
\n
Bachelors Degree in Business Analytics administration, finance, accounting or a related discipline is extremely important
\n
Accuracy and attention to detail
\n
Working knowledge of Excel;
\n
Strong organizational, problem solving & analytical skills
\n
Exceptional oral, written, and interpersonal communication skills
\n
Results oriented
\n
Ability to work in a collaborative and supportive environment
\n
Discretion and confidentiality
\n
Business Analyst candidate having B2B selling experience (1 to 3 yrs.) of Printed flexible Packaging laminates and preformed pouches in North American market. The targeted industry is Snack Food, Candy & Confectionary, Spout Pouches, Pet Food, Lawn & Garden industries.
\n
UFlex is India's largest multinational flexible packaging and solutions company. Our packaging excellence has positioned us as a preferred packaging solutions amongst global brands worldwide. Over the last three decades, we have earned an irreproachable reputation by defining the contours of the packaging industry in India and overseas. As a leading name among packaging companies in innovation and sustainability.
\n
\n
